metadata.name: Retrochronicles: From the 90's to the Future
metadata.description:
"Transporting us through a nostalgic journey, this NFT artwork immerses us in a fascinating throwback to the past of the 1990s. It immerses us in a time when retro games and computers dominated the technological landscape.

This work captures the essence of a bygone era, filled with fond memories and the exciting promise of the future. By exploring the similarities and contrasts between two distinct eras, it invites us to reflect on the constant flow of time and the intersection between the old and the new.
